connector.description: Send a message to a Telegram chat by using your Telegram bot as sender.

camel.kamelet.telegram-sink.authorizatio.name: camel.kamelet.telegram-sink.authorizationToken
camel.kamelet.telegram-sink.authorizatio.description: The token to access your bot on Telegram. You you can obtain it from the Telegram @botfather.

camel.kamelet.telegram-sink.chatId.name: camel.kamelet.telegram-sink.chatId
camel.kamelet.telegram-sink.chatId.description: The Chat ID to where you want to send messages by default.
